text: <@U0289USNA> / <@U026PHQ3J> One thing I noted over the weekend is that our app forces other apps sound to stop. Specifically - when I was playing music, opening the Jordan app forced it to stop. I know that's likely due to our opening video. Any way to have it not do that?
I think so too. If possible, let's make that shift.
wow - yeah - hmm - I'll look into that.
<@U0289USNA> I think the background audio flag might fix that
